name: codespell
description: Fix common misspellings in your source code
helpMarkDown: For help, please raise an issue at https://github.com/rhyskoedijk/codespell-azure-devops/issues
author: Rhys Koedijk

inputs.name: failOnMisspelling
inputs.label: Fail if any misspellings are found
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail if any misspellings are found

inputs.name: postFixCommand
inputs.label: Post-fix command(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Commands to run after fixing misspellings (e.g. 'npm format --fix'). Multiple commands can be separated by a new line.

inputs.name: serviceConnection
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure DevOps service connection to use, if you want to use a different service principal than the default when committing and suggesting changes for misspellings.

inputs.name: accessToken
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure DevOps Personal Access Token (PAT) for accessing Azure DevOps repositories, if you want to use a different service principal than the default when committing and suggesting changes for misspellings.

inputs.name: skipIfCodeSpellConfigMissing
inputs.label: Skip check if codespell is not configured for the repository (i.e. `.codespellrc` does not exist)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip check if codespell is not configured for the repository (i.e. `.codespellrc` does not exist)
